remarks: An element of the non-unital ring homomorphisms restricted to a subset of non-unital rings is a non-unital ring homomorphisms.  (Contributed by AV, 9-Mar-2020.)
statement:
rnghmresel.h $e |- ( ph -> H = ( RngHomo |` ( B X. B ) ) ) $.
rnghmresel $p |- ( ( ph /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) /\ F e. ( X H Y ) ) -> F e. ( X RngHomo Y ) ) $.
